tasks.task_description: Check current build status and dist directory

description: Validate LiqUIdify library build, compilation, and publishing readiness
context: Checked project structure. No dist directory exists yet - need to build the library first.

Build completed successfully. Generated 464KB CSS file with comprehensive Panda CSS styles, all component JS/MJS/CJS files, and TypeScript declaration files. All components are properly compiled with Apple HIG-compliant styles.

All validation steps completed successfully: TypeScript type checking passed, linting passed with only minor warnings about biome config version, formatting is correct, prepublish validation passed, and import functionality is working correctly for both main exports and subpath imports.
